channel.title: How i make npc's drop what i want?
channel.description: How do i make npc's drop what i want, for example, i want a veracs dude, to drop peices of veracs amore, i already tried to do it in npcdrops.cfg but it didnt work... it like, messed up my server... so can someone please help me?
